Notes.Text:
This update for polkit fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-6133: Fixed improper caching of auth decisions, which could bypass 
  uid checking in the interactive backend (bsc#1121826).

Vulnerabilities.Description: In PolicyKit (aka polkit) 0.115, the "start time" protection mechanism can be bypassed because fork() is not atomic, and therefore authorization decisions are improperly cached. This is related to lack of uid checking in polkitbackend/polkitbackendinteractiveauthority.c.
